main event: On June 19, 1960, a patrol radar picked up an unidentified moving target near Medina, Saudi Arabia.
interesting points: The target was approximately 18 miles west of the location and moved within 10 miles before accelerating away at tremendous speed,The object was visually confirmed by crew members standing guard,It appeared round, metallic, and very bright, reflecting sunlight,No visible means of propulsion or vapor trail was observed,The incident was recommended for inclusion in Project Blue Book records.
